title: During calls, Other person can't hear me but I can hear them.
content:
During calls, Other person can't hear me but I can hear them. On switching to speaker mode, they are able to hear me.

Even I tested to use Google assistant, but even it was not working. After this I tried with now playing and again it was not able to detect the songs playing nearby. I contacted customer support. They gave some actions. If the issue is software related... It worked once. But the issue is keep happening to my device in every 1-2 day
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
